column1: #Text=The Church of Wells , based in the small town of Wells , Texas has been at the center of significant media activity in recent days .
#Text=Wikinews spoke with a Tyler , Texas minister who had an encounter with Church of Wells members recently .
#Text=In the media , reports have surfaced surrounding Catherine Grove , a 26 year-old Arkansas woman who recently joined the Church of Wells .
#Text=Grove 's parents and other family say they 've hardly communicated with her since July .
#Text=Grove 's parents have been in Wells since July , hoping to have a chance to speak with her directly .
#Text=A Latin Cross , a comon symbol of Christianity .
#Text=Tyler , Texas is a city located about 70 miles north of Wells .

#Text=The Tyler minister explained to Wikinews , he and several of his church members were distributing food and water to homeless citizens in downtown Tyler when they were accosted by members of the group .
#Text=He described the individuals as appearing " [ ... ] very robotic , kind of disengaged and had very big eyes . "
#Text=The Church of Wells ' group 's leader became " very agitated " and yelled at the minister and his parishioners .
#Text=The minister said he recognized the Church of Wells members from recent news coverage .
#Text=Elaborating on the encounter , he recalled , " At one time , I happened to call him ' brother ' .

#Text=He reported the Church of Wells leader also insulted one of the other church 's volunteers , stating ,  Look at you .

_	_	_	_

#Text=The minister reported the Church of Wells members even followed his group on foot for about two city blocks , and began yelling and hurling insults at them when they arrived at the city 's square plaza .

#Text=When asked if he believes the Church of Wells to be a cult , the minister replied ,  The way they were yelling and the leader seemingly believed that our church member absolutely had to share his testimony aloud with him , specifically him , that 's why I can say with comfort that this group is a cult .

_	_	_	_

#Text=The minister continued ,  As we were about to leave , [ the Church of Wells group leader ] said , ' Prophets of God are not to be mocked . '
